name: WIRELAND
description:
WIRELAND is a game for Windows about a catboy whose girlfriend's physical body was kidnapped (by an alternate version of herself??)

It's about 1-2 hours long and has 2 endings. I made this game for my boyfriend's birthday ^^

WARNINGS: White flashes in cutscenes and battles, swearing, humorous depiction of religion (catholicism), incredibly subtle dirty humor like blink and you'll miss it

Known bugs:

  • the opening animation could freeze in the second panel (of Byubyu and Wire sleeping). If it appears to freeze just close and restart. It can take a few tries to get it to not freeze. Sorry if this happens! It's an unfixable bug that occurs in RPG Maker MV games
  • It's unlikely (only happened to me once) but it can freeze in-battle or in the overworld. So please save as often as you can.
  • if you cannot choose between enemies with arrow keys in-battle you have to just take your cursor off of them (or use cursor to select enemies)

Story, art, animation, music - Lyn

Trivia music transcribed to midi by - Difa Kresnawan

SFX (creative commons sounds made by users on freesound.org)
Josepharaoh99, MrtheNoronha, Mattix, Pumodi, Astrand, Joao Janz, Lulyc, Cabled Mess, TheBuilder15, Rhodesmas, Prof Mudkip, EVRetro, Owlstorm

Plugins - Yanfly, Irina, Galv, SRD, Moghunter, Tamfey

Troubleshooting - MightyEgg

Moral support/testing - Endshark/Byuby
